Interface IUserService

Namespace
MdFilesMerger.App.Abstract
Assembly
MdFilesMerger.App.dll

Defines methods to service IUser objects collection.

Inheritance: IService<T> -> ICRUDService<T> -> IUserService
Implementations: UserService 

public interface IUserService : ICRUDService<IUser>, IService<IUser>

Methods

CheckCredentials(string, string)

Check the credentials.

int CheckCredentials(string userName, string password)

Parameters

userName string

Name of the user.

password string

The password.

Returns

int

Identification number of user with specified name if it is in the collection and specified password is correct; otherwise -1.

UserService

ReadByName(string)

From stored collection of objects, gets user with specified name.

IUser? ReadByName(string name)

Parameters

name string

The name of user that you are looking for.

Returns

IUser

object with Name equal name. If there is no element with specified name in stored collection, method returns null.

See Also
ICRUDService<T>
IService<T>
UserService
IUser

UpdateName(int, string)

Updates the name of user with specified identification number.

int UpdateName(int id, string name)

Parameters

id int

The identification number of updated user.

name string

The new name of the user.

Returns

int

Id of updated user, unless:

  • name is null, Empty or consists only from white-spaces characters,
  • in the collection, there is no user with specified id, or user with specified name already exists,
then -1.
See Also
ICRUDService<T>
IService<T>
UserService
IUser

UpdatePassword(int, string)

Updates the password of user with specified identification number.

int UpdatePassword(int id, string password)

Parameters

id int

The identification number of updated user.

password string

The new password of the user.

Returns

int

Id of updated user, unless, in the collection, there is no user with specified id, or specified password is null, Empty or consists only from white-spaces characters.
